archdesc.runner: Special Collections, Virginia Polytechnic Institute and State University

did.head: Descriptive Summary
did.repository: Special Collections, Virginia Polytechnic Institute and State University, Blacksburg, Va.
did.unittitle: The California Women in Environmental Design Architectural Collection 1990-1994
did.abstract: The collection contains newsletters, a flyer of California Women in Environmental Design (CWED) membership, and a poster for the 4th annual CWED conference. Also included are audiocassettes of differing sessions at the California Women in Environmental Design conferences.

userestrict.head: Use Restrictions
userestrict.p: Permission to publish material from the California Women in Environmental Design Architectural Collection must be obtained from Special Collections, Virginia Tech.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Researchers wishing to cite this collection should include the following information: The California Women in Environmental Design Architectural Collection - Ms1990-059, Special Collections, Virginia Polytechnic Institute and State University, Blacksburg, Va.

acqinfo.head: Acquisition Information
acqinfo.p: The California Women in Environmental Design Architectural Collection was donated to Special Collections in multiple accessions beginning in 1990.

processinfo.head: Processing Information
processinfo.p: Processed and encoded by Harvey Clark, July 2010.

bioghist.head: Biographical Information
bioghist.p: The California Women in Environmental Design (CWED) is a California organization of women professionals and students that are involved in planning, architecture, engineering, landscape architecture, interior design, and related fields. The CWED was formerly known as California Women in Architecture.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content
scopecontent.p: The collection contains two boxes. Box one contains newsletters, membership flyers, posters, and programs of the 1991 San Francisco and 1992 Santa Monica organizational conferences. The second box contains 37 cassette tapes of varying sessions during the CWED conferences.

arrangement.head: Arrangement
arrangement.p: The collection is arranged by material type.

relatedmaterial.head: Related Material
relatedmaterial.p: See also the Sigrid Lorenzen Rupp Architectural Collection, Ms1997-006. Rupp was a president of the CWED and her collection contains materials from her presidency.

did.unittitle: 1992, program from the 5Th annual CWED conference in Santa Monica.
37 audiocassettes from varying sessions of the CWED conferences.
